name: Beldum
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

poke_power.name: Metal Chain
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a {M} Energy card from your hand to Beldum (excluding effects of attacks or Poké-Powers), you may search your deck for Beldum and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.
